context: Dental Fillings,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Dental Examinations,Oral Rehabilitation,
review:
I want to extend my heartfelt thanks to Dr. Sanjay Kumar for his exceptional care and for helping me overcome my long-standing dental anxiety. His kind and supportive approach made all the difference from the moment I walked into his clinic with a dental emergency. Dr. Sanjay, evaluated my dental issues with immense care and had a very positive attitude, clearly explaining the diagnosis and treatment plan step by step. His ability to make me feel comfortable and understood was unparalleled, and I‚Äôve never felt so good and relieved at a dentist‚Äôs office before.

Dr. Kumar's approach reminded me that overcoming fear is the first step to achieving good health. I am now looking forward to my dental treatment with a newfound confidence, thanks to Dr. Sanjay Kumar & his team.

His dedication to patient care & counseling is truly inspiring, and I am grateful for his help in taking this important step towards better dental health.

Best Regards
Richa
reply_text: Thanks for the appreciation and feedback üëç

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
context: Mucogingival Surgery,Dentofacial Orthopedics,Post and Core,Dental Surgery,Dental Implant Fixing,
review:
I am a stage 3 to 4 cancer survivor .and due to side effects of medications , my 6 set crowns on my front teeth kept getting infected and breaking ( I had an accident when I was very young) .
I am settled in UK . And was running pillar to post in UK and was given 4 months for my entire process to be done. I decided to investigate in Delhi where my parents live.
Dr Sanjay was a rarefind. I connected with him on video call . Following which Dr Sanjay proactively communicated with my doctors and dentists in UK via zoom calls and constantly gave me feedback and treatment route.
I was very impressed by his knowledge,  communication and ability to advise my doctors in UK too.
I finally arrived in Delhi and Dr Sanjay helped me with Blood tests, Scans, explained in detail the full process and always had the time for a quick chat about the surgical process. He was absolutely Brilliant. I have now completed my surgery and aftercare process which too only 10 days . I will be back to Delhi in a couple of months and am looking forward to good dental health and brand new teeth.
reply_text:
Thank you Ayesha for the appreciation and trust.
Looking forward to see you.
My best wishes üôè
